discussion_comments.comment_body:
If possible, please keep the `MyRouterContext` with auth as a key.

Essentially, similar to what we already have going. Currently, this would make it difficult to inject Query into the context.

i.e.
```ts
export type MyRouterContext = {
	auth: AuthContextType
}
```

discussion_comments.comment_body: I can update to put stuff under auth - I only went the other direction because it became annoying TBH, BUT... good shout about my approach being more difficult to inject query into the context... shoving under "auth" is less annoying now :D Let me work on resolving this one.
